0.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
0.author: Theodore Roosevelt

1.text: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
1.author: Dalai Lama

2.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
2.author: Theodore Roosevelt

3.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
3.author: Winston Churchill

4.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
4.author: Steve Jobs

help.title: Help & Support
help.heroText: Need guidance? You’re in the right place. Explore guides, FAQs, and support resources below.
quickStartItems: Sign up or log in to access all features.
Use the Reflection Box to journal your thoughts.
Check Analytics to view your mood trends.
Chat with your Wellness Buddy for support.
Visit Relaxation and Stress Check for daily calm.

faqs.q: How do I reset my password?
faqs.a: Go to the Login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions to reset it.

faqs.q: Where can I see my reflections history?
faqs.a: All your reflections are saved in the Reflection Box. You can browse, edit, or delete them anytime.
Yes. All your reflections are stored locally in your browser. Your privacy is protected.
Scroll down to the Contact & Support section to reach us directly.

featureWalkthroughItems: Reflection Box: Write daily journals, track moods, and set goals.
Analytics: View your mood distribution, word count, and activity trends.
Wellness Buddy: Chat with the AI for encouragement and support.
Relaxation: Try breathing exercises and calming practices.
help.contactEmail: 💌 Email us at support@wellnessapp.com for any issues or suggestions.
help.contactUrgent: 🚨 For urgent help, visit the Emergency Helpline page immediately.
help.safetyNote: ⚠️ This app is for self-care support and reflection. It is not a substitute for professional therapy or medical advice. If you’re struggling, please reach out to a licensed therapist or use the Emergency Helpline.

reflectionBox.title: Reflection Box

questions.q1: How often have you felt overwhelmed this week?
questions.q2: How well are you sleeping these days?
questions.q3: How often do you feel anxious about the future?
questions.q4: Do you find time for yourself and hobbies?
questions.q5: How is your energy level today?
questions.q6: When facing stress, what do you usually do?
questions.q7: How often do you experience headaches or muscle tension?
questions.q8: Do you struggle to focus or concentrate?
questions.q9: How often do you feel fatigued even after resting?
questions.q10: Do you notice changes in your eating habits under stress?

wellnessBuddy.intro: Hi! I’m your Wellness Buddy chatbot. How can I support you today?
wellnessBuddy.chatPlaceholder: Your conversation with Wellness Buddy will appear here...
wellnessBuddy.tipText: Take a deep breath and remind yourself:

communityForum.title: Community Forum
communityForum.samplePost: Stress management is the practice of using techniques—like deep breathing, exercise, journaling, or time management—to reduce tension and improve resilience when facing challenges.
